TopicTitle: What planets have you landed on?

Articles.Content:
So far i have landed on Duna, and it's moon Ike. I also have a ship with Bill, Bob, and Jeb orbiting Jool. Their atomic engines fell off the landing stage randomly so no landing on the moons . I'm working to get to Eve next. What planets have you landed on?

Edited September 28, 2012 by 99TheCreator
Duna and Eve so far.
None.. Awh..

I've landed on Eve and Ike. I could probably land on Laythe already, and have designed a surface-to-orbit-and-back shuttle capable of full refueling, but I have this feeling I really want to establish some sort of orbital infrastructure before I set down...

Eve first, and once.

Duna several times.

Kerbin from Duna once

Several failed attempts on the blob of lava. Might try some moons next.
So far just Mun and Minmus. The vehicle I built for those 2 may have enough delta-v to get into orbit around another planet and home again... will have to test (MechJeb first!)

Everywhere except Moho and Gilly. I heard Gilly is unlandable anyways. Luckily a stable and easy to fly interplanetary craft was literally the second rocket I built in 0.17 so I got a head start on exploring.
Landed on Duna once, and I have a probe orbiting Vall.

Duna and Ike. However, I haven't figured out my transfers to get back... I never seem to able to catch Kerbin's orbit right and end up perpetually behind or ahead of it, never able to get into its SoI. I even screwed it up with MechJeb. haha
Duna, Ike, and Laythe

I had a mission yesterday where I aimed to land on Duna, got to it with plenty fuel so I landed on Ike first, did some exploring, then landed/crashed on Duna. The kerbal survived, but the lander is somewhat broken due to last minute panic and horizontal velocities....

Ive also landed on Eve, Laythe (on that volcano-ish island) and of course Minmus and the Mun.

Thinking I might be up for the challenge of Moho now... But that one sounds tricky with overheating engines etc.
Kerbin->Duna->Ike->Kerbin, Kerbin->Laythe (have not tried getting back yet, might have enough fuel), Kerbin->Eve
Im missing Moho, IKe and Gilly
I did mun & back, mimmus & back, eve & stuck, duna - > ike & stuck
None yet. Though capsules are chasing Eve and Duna. I doubt they'll catch one day though, as thay almost run at the same speed.

So far just Mun and Minmus. The vehicle I built for those 2 may have enough delta-v to get into orbit around another planet and home again... will have to test (MechJeb first!)

I did a test... got struck by the Deep Space Cthulhu... 3 kerbinauts are now praying that they have an encounter with Kerbal close enough to aerobrake back home!

Edited September 28, 2012 by doggie015
I've landed several times on Duna, aerobraked through Jool, landed on Laythe, put myself in orbit around Tylo and crash landed on Tylo.
I landed on Duna but my ship broke of my capsal when the parachutes came out. Planning to go to Eve or Ike.
I've landed on Duna, although the exploding bug has discouraged me from trying much else. May try a bit more this weekend.

Objects I've visited so far in 0.17:

-Mun (with now 4 Kerbals stranded on the surface and 3 more stuck in orbit)

-Minmus (currently one Kerbonaut, enough fuel for return-trip)

-Eve (lander with one Kerbonaut floats in metallic ocean, unable to return)

-Duna (two Kerbonauts on the surface, both unable to return)

-Ike (One Kerbonaut, could reach Duna but unable to return home)

-Laythe (two Kerbonauts, both unable to return)
Eve, Duna, Laythe and Tylo. I've also dived into the atmosphere of jool, but it's not really a landing.
Duna, Eve and the next will be Bop.
Duna, Eve, Aerobreaked over Jool, Laythe and Bop.

In order:

Duna(5 times)

Eve(once)

Laythe(once(I took me 2 hours to land on the north pole with 25L of fuel before the encounter, but I made it ))

I was too lazy to land on the Mun and Minmus in this update

Edited September 29, 2012 by Giggleplex777

I've landed everywhere atleast once, except for Tylo, im working on a new version of my stock rover, that can stay there for a loooonnngggg time I've also landed my stock rovers on other planets/moons, currently 2 on Duna, 1 on Ike, 1 on Gilly, and one on Bop
